full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 88 of 261 1249 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 Q. And you continued maintaining contact with some of them; correct? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. You would be on chat groups with them for a period of time? 4 A. I actually was only on the chat group for a very small 5 amount of time. I left the chat group. 6 Q. But nonetheless, for at least a small period of time, you 7 were involved in the chat group with other individuals, other 8 women who claimed they had been abused by Jeffrey Epstein; 9 correct? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. And you had also maintained contact with an individual 12 named Virginia Roberts; correct? 13 A. Yes. 14 Q. And you and Virginia Roberts are represented by the same 15 attorney, Bradley Edwards? 16 A. I don't -- I don't know who represents Virginia. 17 Q. You never have spoken to her about that at all? 18 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor. 19 THE COURT: Grounds? 20 MS. POMERANTZ: Hearsay. 21 THE COURT: Sustained. 22 Q. You're aware that your attorney wrote a book about your 23 case and the case of others while he has been representing you; 24 correct? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012839

text_blocks.content: Q. And you continued maintaining contact with some of them; correct? A. Yes. Q. You would be on chat groups with them for a period of time? A. I actually was only on the chat group for a very small amount of time. I left the chat group. Q. But nonetheless, for at least a small period of time, you were involved in the chat group with other individuals, other women who claimed they had been abused by Jeffrey Epstein; correct? A. Yes. Q. And you had also maintained contact with an individual named Virginia Roberts; correct? A. Yes. Q. And you and Virginia Roberts are represented by the same attorney, Bradley Edwards? A. I don't -- I don't know who represents Virginia. Q. You never have spoken to her about that at all? MS. POMERANTZ: Objection, your Honor. THE COURT: Grounds? MS. POMERANTZ: Hearsay. THE COURT: Sustained. Q. You're aware that your attorney wrote a book about your case and the case of others while he has been representing you; correct?
